fields.name: id
fields.comment: unique id of the command

fields.name: application_id
fields.comment: unique id of the parent application

fields.name: guild_id
fields.comment: unique id of the command, if not global

fields.name: name
fields.comment: 1-32 lowercase character

fields.name: description
fields.comment: 1-100 character description

fields.name: options
fields.comment: the parameters for the command

fields.name: default_permission
fields.comment: whether the command is enabled by default when the app is added to a guild

fields.name: type
fields.comment: value of application command option type

fields.name: name
fields.comment: 1-32 lowercase character

fields.name: description
fields.comment: 1-100 character description

fields.name: required
fields.comment: if the paramter is required or optional -- default false

fields.name: choices
fields.comment: choices for string and int types for the user to pick from

fields.name: options
fields.comment: if the option is a subcommand or subcommand group type, this nested options will be the parameters

fields.name: name
fields.comment: 1-100 character choice name

fields.name: value
fields.comment: value of choice, up to 100 characters

fields.name: id
fields.comment: the id of the command

fields.name: application_id
fields.comment: the id of the parent application the command belongs to

fields.name: guild_id
fields.comment: the id of the guild

fields.name: permissions
fields.comment: the permissions for the command in the guild

fields.name: id
fields.comment: the id of the command

fields.name: type
fields.comment: role or user

fields.name: permission
fields.comment: true to allow, false, to disallow

fields.name: id
fields.comment: id of the interaction

fields.name: application_id
fields.comment: id of the application this iteraction is for

fields.name: type
fields.comment: the request type of the interaction

fields.name: data
fields.comment: the command data payload

fields.name: guild_id
fields.comment: the guild it was sent from

fields.name: channel_id
fields.comment: the channel it was sent from

fields.name: member
fields.comment: guild member data for the invoking user, including permissions

fields.name: user
fields.comment: user object for the invoking user, if invoked in a DM

fields.name: token
fields.comment: a continuation token for responding to the interaction

fields.name: id
fields.comment: the ID of the invoked command

fields.name: name
fields.comment: the name of the invoked command

fields.name: resolved
fields.comment: converted users + roles + channels

fields.name: options
fields.comment: the params + values from the user

fields.name: custom_id
fields.comment: a developer-defined identifier for the component, max 100 characters

fields.name: type
fields.comment: component type

defs.title: Application Command Interaction Data Resolved Structure

fields.name: users
fields.comment: the ids and User objects

fields.name: members
fields.comment: the ids and partial Member objects

fields.name: roles
fields.comment: the ids and Role objects

fields.name: channels
fields.comment: the ids and partial Channel objects

defs.title: Application Command Interaction Data Option Structure

fields.name: name
fields.comment: the name of the parameter

fields.name: type
fields.comment: value of application command option type

fields.name: value
fields.comment: the value of the pair

fields.name: options
fields.comment: present if this option is a group or subcommand

fields.name: type
fields.comment: the type of response

fields.name: data
fields.comment: an optional response message

items.name: CHANNEL_MESSAGE_WITH_SOURCE
items.comment: respond to a interaction with a message

items.name: DEFERRED_CHANNEL_MESSAGE_WITH_SOURCE
items.comment: ACK an interaction and edit a response later, the user sees a loading state

items.name: DEFERRED_UPDATE_MESSAGE
items.comment: for components, ACK an interaction and edit the original message later; the user does not see a loading state

items.name: UPDATE_MESSAGE
items.comment: for components, edit the message the component was attached to

defs.title: Interaction Application Command Callback Data Structure

fields.name: tts
fields.comment: is the response TTS

fields.name: content
fields.comment: message content

fields.name: embeds
fields.comment: support up to 10 embeds

fields.name: allowed_mentions
fields.comment: allowed mentions object

fields.name: flags
fields.comment: interaction application command callback data flags

fields.name: components
fields.comment: message components

defs.title: Interaction Application Command Callback Data Flags

items.name: EPHEMERAL
items.comment: only the user receiving the message can see it

fields.name: id
fields.comment: id of the interaction

fields.name: type
fields.comment: the request type of the interaction

fields.name: name
fields.comment: the name of the application command

fields.name: user
fields.comment: the user who invoked the interaction
